Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails. Review feedback from @aud-1 regarding the environment concept and sound design ideas.
Compile all the character, environment, and prop concepts into a presentation for review by the art director and lead designer. Ensure the presentation is well-organized and visually appealing.
Take a short break, maybe grab a coffee and chat with colleagues about the weekend plans.
Present the concept art to the art director and lead designer (@ldes-1), gathering feedback and incorporating their suggestions.
Lunch break. Enjoy a longer lunch break to unwind before the afternoon's tasks.
Based on the feedback received, begin making final revisions to the concept art. Prioritize the most important changes and ensure they align with the overall vision for the game.
Document all the design decisions and rationale behind the concept art. This documentation will be helpful for other team members who will be using the concepts as a reference.
Finalize all files and upload them to the project repository. Ensure all assets are properly labeled and organized for easy access by other team members.
Wrap up the week's tasks, clean up my workspace, and prepare for the weekend. Reflect on the progress made and identify areas for improvement in the coming weeks.
